column2: BRIEF-Sterling Bancorp Q1 Earnings Per Share $0.43 April 24 (Reuters) - Sterling Bancorp: * ANNOUNCES RECORD RESULTS FOR THE FIRST QUARTER OF 2018 WITH EARNINGS PER SHARE AVAILABLE TO COMMON STOCKHOLDERS OF $0.43 (AS REPORTED) AND $0.45 (AS ADJUSTED), REPRESENTING GROWTH OF 48.3% AND 45.2% OVER THE SAME QUARTER A YEAR AGO * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.45 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * QTRLY NET INTEREST INCOME $234.4 MILLION VERSUS $108.8 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

BRIEF-Provident Bancorp Quarterly Earnings Per Share $0.22 April 19 (Reuters) - PROVIDENT BANCORP INC: * PROVIDENT BANCORP, INC. REPORTS EARNINGS FOR THE MARCH 31, 2018 QUARTER * PROVIDENT BANCORP QTRLY NET INTEREST AND DIVIDEND INCOME BEFORE PROVISION FOR LOAN LOSSES INCREASED BY $1.4 MILLION, OR 18.9% Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
